modName: Word Wall Swap - Fire Breath and Elemental Fury
summary: Swaps Word of Power at Dustman\'s Cairn and Statue to Meridia
descriptionHtml:
Warning: if you have been to either location, this mod will not work as described.

After deciding that I\'m just about done with the Companions questline, but really not wanting to give up the third Word of Power for Fire Breath, I decided to swap the WoP at Dustman\'s Cairn with another. Elemental Fury seemed like a slightly more appropriate fit for the Companions, so I went with that.  Granted the Statue to Meridia location is kind of a gimme, but since this is my first time modding word walls, I wanted something easy to test. 

Speaking of testing, I tested with an existing character and the word wall broke. I got the chanting and Elemental Fury WoP, but the word didn\'t light up, etc. When I tried again with a new character, it worked perfectly, so if you hit a snag, you\'ve probably been too close to that location and the cell info is stuck in your save. Elemental Fury\'s new home in Dustman\'s Cairn has not been tested, however the process was executed the exact same way, so there shouldn\'t be any issues. If you hit a snag and can rule out save issues, please let me know and I\'ll have a look.
author: HyphenC
